description: This file is an HTML document implementing a web-based database viewer interface with embedded CSS and JavaScript. It provides functionality for browsing available databases, viewing tables within a selected database, and displaying data from selected tables, including expandable cells for complex data types.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets current selections, and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing database entries and loading associated tables when a database is selected.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads the tables within a selected database and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data from a selected table, handling empty data and errors.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data, including handling wide content and scroll hints.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual cell content, handling nulls, objects, and long text with expandable view.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data or a truncated preview.
